hero.title: The Future of Cloud, Powered by Artificial Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Transform your infrastructure, multiply your intelligence. CloudNova offers innovative cloud solutions with integrated AI for businesses of all sizes.

chi_siamo.title: About Us
chi_siamo.subtitle: Innovators in the cloud sector with a focus on artificial intelligence integration
chi_siamo.storia_text: CloudNova was born in 2020 from the vision of a group of experts in cloud computing and artificial intelligence with the goal of revolutionizing the way companies use and manage their digital infrastructures.
chi_siamo.storia_text2: In a rapidly evolving technological world, we identified the need for cloud solutions that not only provided computing power and storage, but also natively integrated artificial intelligence capabilities to optimize every aspect of the infrastructure.
chi_siamo.missione_text: Our mission is to democratize access to advanced cloud technologies and artificial intelligence, making these powerful resources available and accessible to organizations of all sizes.
chi_siamo.missione_text2: We believe that the combination of robust cloud infrastructures and integrated artificial intelligence represents the future of business technology, and we are committed to leading this transformation.

valori.title: Our Values
valori.subtitle: Fundamental principles that guide our every action
valori.integrita_text: We act with honesty and transparency in every interaction with customers, partners, and collaborators, always keeping our commitments.
valori.innovazione_text: We constantly research new solutions and technologies to anticipate market needs and offer cutting-edge services.
valori.collaborazione_text: We believe in the power of teamwork and knowledge sharing to achieve excellent results.
valori.sostenibilita_text: We are committed to reducing the environmental impact of our operations and promoting sustainable practices in the technology sector.

cta_section.title: Ready to transform your infrastructure?
cta_section.text: Discover how CloudNova can help you optimize your operations and leverage the power of artificial intelligence.

infrastruttura.title: Infrastructure
infrastruttura.subtitle: State-of-the-art data centers designed for performance, security, and sustainability
infrastruttura.datacenter_text: Our data centers are designed according to the highest standards of security, efficiency, and reliability. We use state-of-the-art hardware and redundant architectures to ensure 99.99% uptime.
infrastruttura.sicurezza_text: Multi-level physical and digital protection with 24/7 monitoring and intrusion detection systems.
infrastruttura.connettivita_text: High-speed network with redundant connections to multiple providers to ensure minimal latency.
infrastruttura.alimentazione_text: Multiple power systems with backup generators and UPS to ensure operational continuity.
infrastruttura.raffreddamento_text: Advanced cooling systems with energy-saving technologies and precise temperature control.

ia_integrata.title: AI Integration
ia_integrata.subtitle: Artificial intelligence that enhances every aspect of your cloud infrastructure
ia_integrata.main_title: Artificial Intelligence at the Service of the Cloud
ia_integrata.main_text: Our platform natively integrates advanced artificial intelligence technologies that automatically optimize every aspect of your cloud infrastructure, from load balancing to security, from resource allocation to failure prediction.
ia_integrata.ottimizzazione_text: Machine learning algorithms that continuously analyze usage patterns to automatically optimize resource allocation, reducing costs and improving performance.
ia_integrata.sicurezza_text: AI-based threat detection systems that identify and neutralize potential vulnerabilities before they can be exploited.
ia_integrata.analisi_text: Forecasting of load peaks and future resource needs for proactive capacity planning.

sostenibilita.title: Sustainability
sostenibilita.subtitle: Eco-friendly cloud solutions for a greener future
sostenibilita.main_text: At CloudNova, we believe that technology should serve not only businesses but also the planet. For this reason, we have implemented numerous initiatives to reduce the environmental impact of our operations and help our customers do the same.
sostenibilita.energia_text: Our data centers are powered 100% by renewable energy sources, significantly reducing our carbon footprint.
sostenibilita.hardware_text: We use recyclable components and adopt responsible disposal practices to reduce electronic waste.
sostenibilita.raffreddamento_text: Innovative cooling systems that reduce energy consumption and minimize water usage.
sostenibilita.carbon_text: We invest in carbon offset projects to neutralize the residual emissions from our operations.

servizi.title: Our Services
servizi.subtitle: Complete cloud solutions for every business need
servizi.cloud_ia_text: Cloud infrastructure powered by artificial intelligence to automatically optimize performance, security, and costs. Ideal for companies seeking maximum performance with minimal management effort.
servizi.hosting_text: Flexible and scalable hosting solutions for websites, applications, and online services. From small businesses to enterprises, we offer customized plans for every need with 24/7 support.
servizi.housing_text: Host your servers in our state-of-the-art data centers, benefiting from enterprise-class infrastructure, redundant connectivity, and top-level physical and digital security.

testimonials.title: Our Clients
testimonials.subtitle: Discover what companies that have chosen CloudNova say about us
testimonials.client_1_text: "Since we migrated our infrastructure to CloudNova, we've seen a 40% improvement in performance and a 25% reduction in operational costs. The AI integration has automated many processes that previously required manual interventions."
testimonials.client_2_text: "CloudNova's automatic scalability allowed us to handle traffic spikes during Black Friday without issues, with a 300% increase in visits. The technical support was exceptional, responding to our requests within minutes."
testimonials.client_3_text: "CloudNova's predictive security blocked several attack attempts before they could cause damage. For a financial sector company like ours, this level of protection is essential. We highly recommend their services."
